banner.title1: Hello, welcome to the portfolio of
banner.title: Paulo Cesar
banner.title2: A web developer passionate about technology, driven by challenges and the desire to create solutions with code and with a keen eye for user experience.

sobre.title: About me
sobre.paragrafo1: Hello! My name is Paulo Cesar, I'm 18 years old and I'm passionate about technology that transforms ideas into visual projects. Since high school, I studied Systems Development and found myself in the world of programming, and today I study Systems Analysis and Development at Anhanguera College.
sobre.paragrafo2: I like learning new things and recently I started sharing my learnings on a blog, writing about what I study and experience in programming. For me, programming is much more than knowing language X or Y - it's about solving problems with the right tools.
sobre.paragrafo3: I am driven by challenges and have a special affection for everything that involves UI (user interface). Creating web applications and websites is where I feel most motivated, always seeking to combine functionality and a good experience for those who use it.

projeto1.title: Personal Marketing
projeto1.text: Project that was part of the final project of the 3rd year of high school. A website that provides content on personal marketing, with the objective of studying employability and standing out in the job market.
